--- layout: default title: OHBM 2010 ---
This collection organizes a number of different posters and talks from NISOx and NISOx collaborators at the 2010 Organization for Human Brain Mapping (OHBM) in Barcelona.

Posters

This section lists all available posters submitted to OHBM 2010 by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Improving Precision and Interpretability of Meta Analysis with a Bayesian Hierarchical Spatial Model
    Authors: Jian Kang, et al.
  • Meta-analytic Functional Connectivity: Finding Brain Regions Multi-way Interactions
    Authors: Reza Salimi-Khorshidi, et al.
  • False Positives in Imaging Genetics Using Nonstationary Cluster-Size Inference
    Authors: Matt Silver, et al.

Courses

This section lists all available OHBM 2010 courses created by or contributed towards by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Introduction to Imaging Genetics
